mapper.select: SELECT boardseq, memberid, membername, title, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as regdate FROM m_board ORDER BY boardseq DESC, regdate DESC
SELECT boardseq, membername, title, boardtxt, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as regdate, viewscnt, likecnt, replycnt FROM m_board WHERE boardseq = #{boardseq}
